DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Dialectical Behavior Therapy Patients With Borderline Personality Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: This study 3-year randomize control trial . Patients refer mental health service Taipei area meet Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition , Text Revision criterion Borderline Personality Disorder . Inclusion criterion include subject fulfill Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition , Text Revision criterion Borderline Personality Disorder , 18-60 year age , sign informed consent , least two episode suicidal non-suicidal self-injurious episode past 5 year , least one 3 month precede enrollment . The exclusion criterion include psychotic disorder , bipolar I disorder , severe physical illness , mental retardation . Outcome measure obtain pre-treatment , 4-month , 8-month post-treatment ( 12-month ) 1-year protocol . Using semi-structured interview battery self-report form , range symptom behavior associate Borderline Personality Disorder assess include suicidal thought , suicide attempt , depression , hopelessness , quality life , disability , service utilization , function . Measures select base previous outcome study dialectical behavior therapy . Outcome variable evaluate blinded assessor .
